name: Ancient coins with relics
description: The money with air of simplicity found in the ancient relics is so prized that many collectors collect several of them and show them off.

name: Ancient Dagger [2]
description: The cover is marked by the impressive words "Study Non-Stop". If you keep holding on and accurately perform magic in a quick move, Then your strength will be improved.

name: Ancient Dagger [3]
description: The cover is marked by the impressive words "Study Non-Stop". If you keep holding on and accurately perform magic in a quick move, Then your strength will be improved.

name: Ancient Gold Ornament
description: Gold accessories with ancient magic power. It will change according to the job and level of the user.
effect: When equipped by Swordsman/Merchant/Rogue/Archer, Atk ＋10%,When Refining ＋10, All Attributes ＋2

name: Ancient Gold Ornament [1]
description: Gold accessories with ancient magic power. It will change according to the job and level of the user.
effect: When equipped by Swordsman/Merchant/Rogue/Archer, Atk ＋10%,When Refining ＋10, All Attributes ＋2

name: Ancient Gold Ornament [1] Blueprint
description: Gold accessories with ancient magic power. It will change according to the job and level of the user.

name: Ancient Magic Card Album
description: Old Magic Card Collection. Use it and you will get a card that has not been lit up in the Adventure Handbook Card Collection (The adventurers who light up all the cards will get a card of Blue Quality randomly)

name: Ancient Scroll
description: An shabby sheepskin scroll full of vicissitudes of life, from its appearance you cannot see its effect, but it is the inheritance of the ancient House Lemia. With this scroll, you can go to find Lemia Holt to get a precious weapon appearance.

name: Ancient Tower Golden Ejector
description: Uses it to immediately clear floor 1 to 10 of Endless Tower that are not yet cleared and receive the reward of [upgraded Tower Lab Ejector only available to adventurers who have explored the Endless Tower before]
